import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { api } from "../../services/api" import { Container } from "./styles" export const TransactionsTable: React.FC = () => { const [ transactions, setTransactions ] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { api.get('/transactions') .then((response: any) =>setTransactions(response.data)) }, []) return(
Title Value Category Date
) }
